songs.title: Throne Air
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
The Grand Wizard, B-O-B
B, Do you wanna be down with the king? O-B
The Grand Wizard B-O-B
B, Do you wanna be down with the king? O-B

[Verse 1]
They try to get under my skin, ingrown hair
Rappers in a box, huh, you belong there
I cut four holes in the top, you could draw air
King, I should start an airline called Throne Air
Niggas never step but be having long stairs
Fuck your girl like rabbits all night, that's long hair
Ain't talking royalty but I brought the Dutches
My blunts is Dublin, you black but your blood be Russian
I said I showed you niggas how to do gold, I'm a blacksmith
My demographic all say my verse demographic
Wish a nigga would, presidential cabinet
Too much baggage, if you fly I'm gravity
Your water ain't shit, I control the drip
Show up with a bitch look like Farrah Fawcett
Made a couple m's cleaning out my closet
Just a prophet that make profit

[Chorus]
(Bands) The Grand Wizard (Bands), B-O-B
(Bands) B, Do you wanna be down with the king? (Bands), O-B
(Bands) The Grand Wizard (Bands), B-O-B
(Bands) B, Do you wanna be down with the king? (Bands) O-B

[Verse 2]
Looking out the window
I close blinds but I win though
Beat drop, rappers barely stayin' alive
That's how this go, my disc go platinum like Sisqo
First class nigga, y'all snuck in the cargo
Had to call an embargo
I'm the black El Dorado
I put the fye in WiFi
Your ex files for divorce, sci-fi
She on standby, I land on her cheeks (Huh)
In my seats is 30,000 feet
Join the mile high club or see 36 deep
She gets off at concourse B (Ah)
That's why they say I'm deranged
B-b-b-b I brought my snake on the plane, getting brain
I step off the plane, terms ill
Terminology filled with shit to heal the terminally ill

[Chorus]
(Bands) The Grand Wizard (Bands), B-O-B
(Bands) B, Do you wanna be down with the king? (Bands), O-B
(Bands) The Grand Wizard (Bands), B-O-B
(Bands) B, Do you wanna be down with the king? (Bands) O-B
Your water, your water, your water ain't shit
I control drip, drip, drip, drip, drip, drip
Your water ain't shit, I control the drip
I control the drip
You water ain't shit, I control the drip
I control the drip, drip, drip
You water ain't shit, I control the drip
